name: Xian-Ling Mao
description: I am an associate professor in Beijing Institute of Technology. I focus mainly on machine learning and web mining. Specifically, I focus on Deep Learning、Topic Modeling、 Question Answering and Learn to Hashing etc. Until now, I have published 20+ top papers on AAAI, IJCAI, TKDE, CIKM, EMNLP, COLING etc. I have served as Reviewer for ACM TOIS，ACM TIST、Information Sciences、WWWJ etc.；PC Member for AAAI 2020&2019、SIGIR 2019&2018、COLING 2018 and IJCAI 2019&2018 etc.
